https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oRWVakC4UfXAgdh7wrrugiwO4JC.jpg The film is about the relationship between crazy scientist George Edison and his son Leo. After being electrocuted as a child, Leo is no longer able to touch people without electrocuting them. Edison And Leo
